title: Crisis Mode
description: The AI race is heating up. Start with limited funding and higher doom. Can you turn the tide before it's too late?
author: P(Doom) Team

events.name: Urgent Warning
events.description: A prominent AI researcher has gone public with concerns about the pace of capability development. The world is watching.

options.message: Your public support helps legitimize safety concerns.
You keep your head down and continue working.

events.name: Investor Pressure
events.description: Your investors are concerned about the lab's financial runway. They're pushing for more aggressive timelines.

options.message: Additional funding secured, but at what cost?
Your commitment to safety is noted.
